# Making data {#sec-making-data}

A number of data have been constructed from within R for the purpose of this course.

Scripts and data can be obtained from the following course repository within its data folder: <https://github.com/geocaruso/MAGEO0641/tree/main/data>

The scripts are reproduced on this page

## Scraping a wikipedia table

Example of the Tour de France winners table from wikipedia, used in the Vectors chapter of the course: @sec-factors.

```{r, eval=FALSE, file="data/TourDeFrance/TourDeFrance.R"}
```
